name: GoggleSoc Goggles Cover
description: Like a toque for your goggles, pull the GoggleSoc on when you’re not wearing them, pull it off when you're ready to ride.No need to take off when you leave your goggles on your helmet.Made with 88% recycled PET from recycled plastic bottles and 12% polyester.Elasticised trim fits over goggles big and small.Large label is grab-able with gloves on.
